reviews.content: Great tweak, but puts me into respring loops and randomly resprings my phone sometimes so I have to uninstall it :( hopefully it gets fixed soon.
Amazing tweak that takes me back to the great old days of weatherboard8. So happy to see it updated for ios 12.4
Works great on iPhone 7, no Live Weather on iPad 6. Both on iOS 12.1.1.
Works great! It’s a must-have, especially considering it’s free.
Neried controls don’t work with this but a very nice tweak.
Tweak is working good but the problems is with A12 device you can’t change the settings in the tweak so I hope you do an update to fix this problem thanks
Amazing tweak. Best alternative for a wallpaper. Beautiful animations with no lag whatsoever...!
